# This file was generated by gr_modtool, a tool from the GNU Radio framework
# This file is a part of gr-mxvii
#
# SPDX-License-Identifier: GPL-3.0-or-later
#

########################################################################
# Setup library
########################################################################
include(GrPlatform) #define LIB_SUFFIX

list(APPEND mxvii_sources
    encoder_impl.cc
)

set(mxvii_sources "${mxvii_sources}" PARENT_SCOPE)
if(NOT mxvii_sources)
    MESSAGE(STATUS "No C++ sources... skipping lib/")
    return()
endif(NOT mxvii_sources)

# DC: use c++20 standard for this module but not for its users
# DC: add m17cxx and codec2 to the required libraries
add_library(gnuradio-mxvii SHARED ${mxvii_sources})
target_compile_features(gnuradio-mxvii PRIVATE cxx_std_20) 
# target_link_libraries(gnuradio-mxvii PRIVATE gnuradio::gnuradio-runtime m17cxx codec2)
target_link_libraries(gnuradio-mxvii PRIVATE gnuradio::gnuradio-runtime codec2)
target_include_directories(gnuradio-mxvii
    PUBLIC $<BUILD_INTERFACE:${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/../include>
    PUBLIC $<INSTALL_INTERFACE:include>
  )
set_target_properties(gnuradio-mxvii PROPERTIES DEFINE_SYMBOL "gnuradio_mxvii_EXPORTS")

if(APPLE)
    set_target_properties(gnuradio-mxvii PROPERTIES
        INSTALL_NAME_DIR "${CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX}/lib"
    )
endif(APPLE)

########################################################################
# Install built library files
########################################################################
include(GrMiscUtils)
GR_LIBRARY_FOO(gnuradio-mxvii)

########################################################################
# Print summary
########################################################################
message(STATUS "Using install prefix: ${CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX}")
message(STATUS "Building for version: ${VERSION} / ${LIBVER}")

# ########################################################################
# # Build and register unit test
# ########################################################################
# include(GrTest)
# 
# # If your unit tests require special include paths, add them here
# #include_directories()

# list(APPEND test_mxvii_sources
# qa_encoder.cc
# )
# # Anything we need to link to for the unit tests go here
# list(APPEND GR_TEST_TARGET_DEPS gnuradio-mxvii)

#     return()
# endif(NOT test_mxvii_sources)
# 
# foreach(qa_file ${test_mxvii_sources})

#         ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/${qa_file}
#     )
# endforeach(qa_file)
